Name: THT
Review Text: Nice place and nice waiter. The food we had was also great and really "abordable" as we say in French!!

Name: THT
Review Text: The welcoming usher was decent but not so friendly. He told us that there is no table outside arrogantly. The waitress was friendly and kind. I had artichoke and she asked if I want to open it by myself or the kitchen can do it. The restaurant has lots variety of vegan food.

Name: THT
Review Text: A quick ferry ride from Central. We had drinks outside and enjoyed the view. The restaurant inside was spacious and the food looked good. Will be going back to try it. The waiter was friendly and chatty.

Name: THT
Review Text: At our final stop in Amsterdam for dinner, we came here after going to the next door lookout. What a gem! The food was amazing and so were the drinks. Staff was extremely helpful on a busy night. If we lived here, we would come all the time. The vibe was incredible. Cheers!

Name: THT
Review Text: Small tapas that can be shared with the whole table. Options for vegans and vegetarians as well as a special card for any allergies or intolerances! Food tasted delicious just a bit pricy (estimate around 25€ per person for food and drinks). Close to the ferry.

Name: THT
Review Text: This is one of me favourite places in Amsterdam. I. Love the ambient, decor and the location. I wish their stuff was less "moody", but overoll their moods can't influence my experience, because I really love this spot.

Name: THT
Review Text: Superb food. One person of the staff not very friendly at the beginning, later improved. Great place to eat for going later to a concert. Paradiso Noord is just round the corner, literally.

Name: THT
Review Text: I will give them a four just because the food is so fantastic. The service is really a low point for me but I’m happy with my food baby. Highlight was the veggie burger and the curry

Name: THT
Review Text: Don't get the poke bowl.  Service was nice but slow and inattentive.  Was asked for order without being given a menu.  Asked for regular water with ice because it was so hot and got a tiny bottled water, and charged for it.

Name: THT
Review Text: Staff slow. The food was average.

Name: THT
Review Text: Beautiful sunny, terrace and hands down the best (friendly, caring, going the extra mile) service I have experienced in Amsterdam. And as cherry on top they made a five star ice cafe!

Name: THT
Review Text: Best hippie places with delicious hapjes in Amsterdam. Very delicious, many options for vegan and vegetarian. …

Name: THT
Review Text: Large, quite noisy restaurant, a short ferry trip from the central station. Parking is a struggle. Really a place where you would go with groups I think. Nicely built but I certainly didnt find it a cosy place. Lots of large tables. Food …

Name: THT
Review Text: Terrible; egg over cooked: totally hard, hollandaise sauce partly split and no taste of vinegar or lemon juice making it totally flat in taste. The bread and salmon doesn’t work anyway. Table partner got a rotten avocado was taken back to kitchen after which a slightly less rotten avocado arrived. Avoid!

Name: THT
Review Text: Lovely place, good food. Especially good for big groups

Name: THT
Review Text: Extremely fast service and nice staff. Tasty cocktails.

Name: THT
Review Text: Great location. Staff were friendly but definitely forgot about our order. I put it down to lockdown re-opening jitters. Worth a visit to have a beer over looking the IJ if you are visiting as a tourist.

Name: THT
Review Text: Cool place to have a happy hour with beers and snacks after work.

Review Text: Really nice food. The servicd could be better. A little bit expensive.

Name: THT
Review Text: Their concept is sharing dishes, which I really like. We were with a large group and we ordered a lot of dishes, all were very nice and they have a large selection of vegetarian dishes.  They have a great dessert wine. Great place, highly recommended!

Name: THT
Review Text: Ok good views and it's very lively, there's a nice buzz around the place and the staff were very good. Unfortunately the food let it down for me. The concept of the menu is good small portions but a large selection which I like however I …

Name: THT
Review Text: Nice place with good atmosphere.  Easy to get from the central station. It tends to be very busy, so sometimes you need wait for the service.  The menu changes with seasons. I really enjoy the food there. We are always coming back.

Name: THT
Review Text: Disgusting finger food and zero customer service! The ran out of one dish that we ordered, so we HAD TO ASK FOR A REFUND, because they forgot. After asking 3 times to get our money back, the manager gave us not the full amount back. Definitely a no go!

Name: THT
Review Text: Had the excellent rijs taffel one day & went back for the traditional pea soup the next. Good food, good service & a nice view into the bargain. They even do a good range of gluten free alternatives as well

Name: THT
Review Text: Rude. My girlfriend and I wanted to have a drink upstairs with a view. We were told no because we’re not having dinner. It was early (4:30pm) and plenty of tables were open so we didn’t understand why. The hostess was a bit rude and told us to go to the downstairs bar. We decided to just leave and go to another place. Won’t be back.
